thread.title: Top Class!'n
thread.title_full: Top Class!'n - Review of The Soho Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: stocky12
title: Top Class!'n
text: Visited the Soho Hotel with husband for a birthday treat of Sunday lunch followed by film viewing. The hotel is very trendy with fantastic art and beautiful comfortable surroundings. The waiters were the best I have experienced in a hotel. Phil needs to be remunerated well as he is a first class supervisor/waiter. He commands the restaurant and politely organises his staff. Well what can I say about the food -superb!!!! The portions aren't small but nice and filling. The Sunday roast was to die for. Then we went into the screening room which is a perfect size and lots of room. The extra treat of free bottled water and popcorn was a lovely touch. I would recommend this hotel to everyone!!! Well done Firmdale - I have been to the Ham Yard and this hotel -restaurant is just as good. You have great vision.
